description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Plugscheduler scheduled task elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-26238), it is essential to apply the security update provided.

1. Download the update package (KB5037768) from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Install the update on your system.
3. Restart your system to ensure that the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This update resolves the improper link resolution before file access vulnerability, which could allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges. Ensure that you are running one of the affected Windows 10 builds (22H2 or 21H2).
For manual installation, download the update package from: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is installed with Windows 10 Version 21H2 or 22H2.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
